paragraph.text: Hi {customer first name}, Thanks, Doug 0407 187 194
paragraph.html:
Hi {customer first name}, 

We have two good options on the budget that may be of interest, please see below. 

I'm sure you'll have more questions, so please do get back to me if I can help further. 

Thanks, 

Doug 0407 187 194

paragraph.text: Watch the video to see what we're all about.

What do our customers say?
Kim H: I just wanted to say thank you very much to Boat Hire Sydney for the fabulous trip that we all had on Catalpa last Saturday. The boat was exactly what we were looking for, clean, spacious, great facilities etc and the skipper and his wife were wonderful. It was relaxing and exciting and I know that my friend had a fabulous hen's party. Thanks for making the whole booking experience so easy and efficient, it certainly took the stress out of organising the do. I was very impressed and would recommend your company to anyone looking to hire a boat for private use on the harbour.
paragraph.html:
What do our customers say?

Kim H:
I just wanted to say thank you very much to Boat Hire Sydney for the fabulous trip that we all had on Catalpa last Saturday. The boat was exactly what we were looking for, clean, spacious, great facilities etc and the skipper and his wife were wonderful. It was relaxing and exciting and I know that my friend had a fabulous hen's party. Thanks for making the whole booking experience so easy and efficient, it certainly took the stress out of organising the do. I was very impressed and would recommend your company to anyone looking to hire a boat for private use on the harbour.

Anonymous:
I had the most amazing birthday ever, thanks to Doug at BHS!!! At first I was a little hesitant to have my birthday on a boat. Doug set up a time for me to look at the boat, meet the owners, and was more than happy to answer the one million questions that I kept thinking of (Thanks Doug!). In the end, it turned out to be, by a mile - the most memorable, fun and amazing afternoon - and perfect for an awesome birthday. I will most definitely be going back to BHS in the near future. Doug, the boat, the level of service, and the memory of an amazing afternoon - I highly recommend BHS to anyone that is looking to have a great day or night. Thanks Doug! I can't wait to do it again! :) B

Josh P:
i can not recommend doug enough he went above and beyond to ensure that i had a boat for a bucks party . even though all avenues were exhausted doug was still able to find us something through his contacts . i recommend using this service to anyone looking for a good time on the harbor 
doug is the man

Anonymous:
We had the best night out Ever! Doug showed us around the boat and helped us organise everything. Everything ran smoothly, Thanks Doug.

paragraph.text:
To secure a booking we ask for 2 things:
1. The Booking Form: We will complete an online booking form and send it to your email address. This will include at least the basic details of the cruise such as the date and start time as well as pricing and your contact details. You will need to review these details along with the Terms & Conditions before approving the booking form online.
2. The Deposit: A deposit is required before we can guarantee your booking. The amount will vary by boat and date, and we will let you know the exact amount.
We will let you know once we have received both of the above and your booking is confirmed.
Note that the balance is normally due 2 weeks before the cruise (except for NYE).
paragraph.html: To secure a booking we ask for 2 things: 1. The Booking Form: We will complete an online booking form and send it to your email address. This will include at least the basic details of the cruise such as the date and start time as well as pricing and your contact details. You will need to review these details along with the Terms & Conditions before approving the booking form online. 2. The Deposit: A deposit is required before we can guarantee your booking. The amount will vary by boat and date, and we will let you know the exact amount. We will let you know once we have received both of the above and your booking is confirmed. Note that the balance is normally due 2 weeks before the cruise (except for NYE). Ready To Book? Just let us know via email, SMS or phone and we'll get the ball rolling. You can contact Doug on 0407 187 194 or doug@boathiresydney.com.au
For further information you can contact Doug on 0407 187 194 or via email at doug@boathiresydney.com.au
